DReceived.description: Date received | This date will match to a folder N:\CancerEpidem\BrBreakthrough\Janeh\Flagging\CEN\yyyymmdd containing the source data received.

Region.description: Region | England and Wales: Received from HSCIC (Health & Social Care Information Centre) or earlier equivalent. Scotland: Received from GRO NHSCR (General Register Office for Scotland, NHS Central Register)

CreatedBy.description: Record created by | 'CEN' if automated import, Network login ID of user if manually entered

UpdatedBy.description: Record updated by | Network Login ID of user performing the update

DCancelled.description: Date cancellation of registration received | This date will match to a folder N:\CancerEpidem\BrBreakthrough\Janeh\Flagging\CEN\yyyymmdd containing the source data received.
